analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naatīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naanāgato dhammo paccuppannassa
analyzed: na atītaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na anāgataḥ dhammo paccuppannassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naatīto ca naanāgato ca dhammā paccuppannassa dhammassa
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na atīto ca na anāgato ca dhammā paccuppannassa dhammassa

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā satta, anantare tīṇi …pe… nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye satta, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe adhipatiyā satta anantare tīṇi pe nissaye tīṇi upanissaye satta purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naatītārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na atīta ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na atīta ārammaṇam dhamma

original: paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭicca paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: hetuyā sattarasa ārammaṇe pannarasa adhipatiyā nava pe purejāte āsevane nava pe avigate sattarasa
